scripts.run: node scripts/deploy.js && tsc --noEmit && parcel templates/*.html templates/*.pug --out-dir build
scripts.start: node scripts/deploy.js && tsc --noEmit && parcel templates/*.html templates/*.pug --out-dir build
scripts.deploy: node scripts/deploy.js && tsc --noEmit && parcel build templates/*.html templates/*.pug --out-dir build --no-cache --no-source-maps
